meanings.definition: A system of working a set number of hours with the starting and finishing times chosen within agreed limits by the employee.
meanings.sent1: At my job, we have flexitime, so I can start work a bit later if needed.
meanings.sent2: Flexitime allows employees to adjust their work hours to better suit their personal schedules.
meanings.sent3: The office manager joked that flexitime means you can come to work in your pajamas if you want.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flexitime, time becomes a flexible friend rather than a strict master.
meanings.sent5: Flexitime gives employees the freedom to balance work and life more effectively.
